# List of publically available FRI datasets

CASFRI is designed so users can build their own versions using the data they have available. The following is a list of publically available datasets from jurisdications across Canada. Other datasets may be available to users by requesting it from the data provider.

### British Columbia
Current and historical version of the BC Vegetation Resource Inventory are available from the [BC data catalogue](https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/group/vegetation-resource-inventory).

### Manitoba
Data from the Manitoba Land Initiative is available from their [web portal](https://mli2.gov.mb.ca/forestry/index.html).

### Nova Scotia
The current forest inventory is available from [government website](https://novascotia.ca/natr/forestry/gis/forest-inventory.asp) along with older versions of the inventory.

### Quebec

### Yukon
Yukon's older 5k data as well as their newer 40k data can be downloaded from the GeoYukon [Data Exporer](https://mapservices.gov.yk.ca/geoyukon/?&LayerTheme=Forestry).
